author: pdobacz
content: This doesn't sound like an obstacle to what I'm thinking about. By `no_expectations_on_validity=True` in `eof_test` I mean that code-under-test validity is taken from the client doing the filling, not assumed by the test author.. Filled JSON fixtures would have that information.

author: pdobacz
content: <@316280621783580673> Hello, is the https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/edit/main/spec/implementation_matrix.md#testing-readiness-matrix up to date for nethermind?

author: ben_a_adams
content:
